text:
(OS 10048)Only one usage of each socket address (protocol/network address/port)
 is normally permitted.  : make_sock: could not bind to address 0.0.0.0:80
no listening sockets available, shutting down
Unable to open logs

How to resolve this?
creator: ericd_@hotmail.com
robert@profundis.se
text:
Apache is probably already running (sitting on the socket and locking the 
logs). That is, not a bug, but simply usage problems. If you had put part of 
the error into google, you'd have found that out.

This is no place for setup issues, and if you have problems, direct questions 
to the user mailing list, see: http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html
*** Bug 26220 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: erik@codefaktor.de
erik@codefaktor.de
text:
No response from reporter and most probably a configuration issue. Feel free to reopen if you 
encounter any further problems with this.
